trigger_event: Code commit to a feature branch
success_criteria: Code linting (Flake8, Black) passes. All Pytest unit tests pass. Code coverage for new code >= 80% (REQ-1-504). No new 'Critical' or 'Blocker' issues in SonarQube.
failure_action: Block pull request merge. Post failure summary as a PR comment.
tools_used: GitHub Actions, Pytest, Flake8, Black, SonarQube
escalation_procedure: PR author is responsible for fixing. Tech lead is notified if blocked for >1 day.
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and basic defects from entering the main branch.

trigger_event: Merge to main branch, before deployment to Staging
success_criteria: All integration tests pass. Core regression suite of E2E tests (Playwright) pass with >98% success rate. Smoke test on deployed staging environment passes.
failure_action: Halt deployment to Staging. Roll back main branch if necessary. Create high-priority bug.
escalation_procedure: Alert sent to entire development team via Slack/Teams.
business_impact: Ensures the staging environment is always stable for UAT and further testing.

trigger_event: Manual trigger for production release candidate
success_criteria: UAT completed with sign-off from Product Owner. All performance benchmark tests pass. DAST security scan finds zero 'High' or 'Critical' vulnerabilities. Data migration dry-run (if applicable) validation report is approved. No outstanding P0/P1 bugs.
failure_action: Block production deployment. Schedule emergency review meeting.
responsible_team: QA Lead, Product Owner, DevOps Lead
tools_used: JMeter/Locust, OWASP ZAP, Manual Test Case Management Tool
escalation_procedure: Go/No-Go decision by project steering committee.
business_impact: Final quality and security check before impacting live users. Prevents major production incidents.
